QuestData.Title: In Ared's Memory
QuestData.Description: My master has gone on to the Light, but I will continue his work.$b$b<Miall looks to Ared >$b$bShanai ortar, Ared.$b$bI will have his body sent to Auchindoun. For now, show me this artillery tower of yours.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Miall inside of Fort Wrynn in Talador.
QuestData.RewardText: This is a beautiful and well equipped structure. Thank you for allowing me to work here.$b$bI am positive with this place I can carry on my master's legacy. You will not regret this!

Objectives.Objective: Meet with Miall at the Armory
